dictionary.title: MicrobeMod_BacteriaAnti
dictionary.desc: Dictionary consisting of 5 terms plus 78 related synonyms. Some entries may also include the term's: source, description, wikidataID, chebiID, chebiName, FDAcode
dictionary.author: Emanuel Faria, President of ®Verriclear Natural Skin Essentials Ltd. https://www.verriclear.com
dictionary.contributor: Peter Murray-Rust: Reader Emeritus in Molecular Informatics, Unilever Centre, Dept. Of Chemistry University of Cambridge

entry.description: Use of a drug to treat or prevent bacterial infections.
Use of an organonitrogen heterocyclic antibacterial whose structure contains a quinolone or quinolone-related skeleton.
Use of a class of sulfonamides whose members generally have bacteriostatic antibacterial properties.
entry.synonym: treatment with a sulfonamide anti-bacterial activities

entry.description: Treatment with a broad-spectrum polyketide antibacterial produced by the Streptomyces genus of actinobacteria.

entry.description: Use of a drug with a macrocyclic lactone with a ring of twelve or more members which exhibits antibacterial activity.
